item.title: Open Source Pentesting
item.description: My talk today at Wild West Hacking Fest was about some documents that I released here. I’ll make this blog post more indepth later but for right now I wanted to get the slides out. (If you can’t access one of the documents yet, don’t ask for permission to do so, it just means either they aren’t ready yet, I’ll make posts about each one as they become available) Here is the main slide deck for the docs: https://bit.
